meanings.definition: A smell or scent, especially a pleasant one.
meanings.sent1: The fresh odors of flowers filled the room.
meanings.sent2: I love the odors of freshly baked cookies.
meanings.sent3: The odors of the delicious meal made everyone's stomach growl.
meanings.sent4: The odors of success lingered in the air after the team won the championship.
meanings.sent5: The sweet odors of the bakery drew customers in from the street.

meanings.definition: A distinctive smell, especially one that is unpleasant.
meanings.sent1: The foul odors from the garbage can made me hold my nose.
meanings.sent2: The odors from the sewer were unbearable.
meanings.sent3: The odors from the old socks could be used as a prank on April Fools' Day.
meanings.sent4: The odors of failure hung heavy in the room after the project flopped.
meanings.sent5: The pungent odors of the skunk made us all run in the opposite direction.
